item.title: Some applications on Linux Mint
item.description:
## Calibre
```shell sudo apt install -y libxcb-cursor-dev sudo -v && wget -nv -O- https://download.calibre-ebook.com/linux-installer.sh | sudo sh /dev/stdin ```
## Rime 拼音输入法
```shell sudo apt install -y ibus-rime # 安装之后，重启电脑于托盘位置设置 ```
## Power Saver
TLP is a highly configurable power saving tool for laptops. There is a flatpak called TLP gui or something if you want to tweak the config graphically (never tried it myself), or you can edit the config file directly. The default settings should be fine though.
```shell sudo apt install tlp tlp-rdw smartmontools sudo systemctl enable --now tlp.serv ``` Then, reboot. You can check the current status of tlp with
```shell sudo tlp-stat ```。
